title: Indian Renew Standalone December 2025 Net Sales at Rs 2,129.87 crore, up 25.4% Y-o-Y
author: Broker Research
content:
Reported Standalone quarterly numbers for Indian Renewable Energy Development Agency are:Net Sales at Rs 2,129.87 crore in December 2025 up 25.4% from Rs. 1,698.45 crore in December 2024. Quarterly Net Profit at Rs. 584.91 crore in December 2025 up 37.5% from Rs. 425.38 crore in December 2024. EBITDA stands at Rs. 1,960.45 crore in December 2025 up 24.05% from Rs. 1,580.42 crore in December 2024. Indian Renew EPS has increased to Rs. 2.09 in December 2025 from Rs. 1.58 in December 2024. Indian Renew shares closed at 141.50 on January 09, 2026 (NSE)
